title: This part sets out the standard space requirements of various parts of building, light and ventilation, the building services, fire safety, etc
clause_text: This part sets out the standard space requirements of various parts of building, light and ventilation, the building services, fire safety, etc. The following parts of a building, wherever present, shall conform to the requirements given herein:
section: Off street parking requirement for various Planning Authorities / Areas

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
